org.sql: SELECT users.* FROM users INNER JOIN follows ON follows.followable_type = "$1" AND follows.followable_id = users.id WHERE follows.blocked = "$2" AND follows.follower_id = "$3" AND follows.follower_type = "$4" AND follows.followable_type = "$5"

rewrites.sql: SELECT users.* FROM users INNER JOIN follows ON follows.followable_type = "$1" AND follows.followable_id = users.id WHERE follows.blocked = "$2" AND follows.follower_id = "$3" AND follows.follower_type = "$4" AND follows.followable_type = "$5" LIMIT 1
